Articles.Content: Here it is, capable of horizontal takeoff and vertical landing on the mun or minmus, with plenty of fuel to get back. Stock and Lander variants available.
I tried both of them barely had enough fuel to get out of the atmosphere no matter how I took off. What am I missing?

I tried both of them barely had enough fuel to get out of the atmosphere no matter how I took off. What am I missing?

Same issue.

Are you using stock CFGs?
Probably because you're going full throttle the whole way. On takeoff you don't want to go above 1/3 throttle.

Probably because you're going full throttle the whole way. On takeoff you don't want to go above 1/3 throttle.

Don't mean to burst your bubble, but if you haven't heard of it, the reason you are able to make it to the mun is because of the Fuel Bug :/
